amendment.description: Amendment establishes the Sex Offender Management Assistance Program which provides flexible block grants to States to offset costs directly associated with meeting Federal requirements for sex offender registration and community notification programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to create the Sex Offender Management Assistance Program to provide states with grants to offset costs for sex offender registration and community notification programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bass amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
